title: Tadej Pogačar Coming in Hot for Rainbow Jersey Season Debut: ‘I’m Feeling Good and Ready to Go’
content:
Pogačar expected to set the tone for San Remo, Flanders, and Tour de France in sponsor-pleasing jaunt at the UAE Tour.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar Coming in Hot for Rainbow Jersey Season Debut: ‘I’m Feeling Good and Ready to Go’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
